thumb.title: にじかって誰.mp3
thumb.description: Who is Nijika?For the blind, she is vision.For the hungry, she is the chef.For the thirsty, she is water.If Nijika thinks, I agree.If Nijika speaks, I’m listening.If Nijika has a million fans, I am one of them.If Nijika has ten fans, I am one of them.If Nijika has only one fan, that is me.If Nijika has no fans, I no longer exist.If the whole world is against Nijika, I am against the whole world.I will love Nijika until my very last breath.
